room_title: Escape room "The Speakeasy" by 21 Keys Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: I’m an escape room addict at this point- I’ve done almost 20 of these!  This is my first one at 21 keys, I went with a group of 4 from work.  The atmosphere was really good, and the puzzles were challenging without being frustrating.  I definitely recommend this place.  I’ll be back for some of their other rooms

room_title: Escape room "The Speakeasy" by 21 Keys Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: This was our first time doing an escape room and we loved it! The Speakeasy room game was challenging but the puzzles were still able to be solved. Everyone in our group had a blast and we all want to do it again.

room_title: Escape room "The Speakeasy" by 21 Keys Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: Went with a group of 10 and had so much fun! Just hard enough to feel challenging but not so much that it felt frustrating. Will definitely be returning.

room_title: Escape room "The Speakeasy" by 21 Keys Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: This was so much fun. I really liked that they made it really clear what wasn't a clue to avoid wasting time without ruining the challenge of it. We had a group of 10 and everyone got to be involved without feeling like we were standing on top of each other. 100% will be back!
